    • Method Detail

      • queryBuilder

        public QueryBuilder queryBuilder()
        Description copied from interface: QueryFactory

        Creates a builder to build queries with capability for UNION, INTERSECT, and EXCEPT set operations.

        Calling this method is equivalent in calling QueryFactory.queryBuilder(QueryExpressionBody) and passing QueryExpressionBody.EmptyQueryExpressionBody as argument.

        Specified by:
        queryBuilder in interface QueryFactory
        Returns:
        The new QueryBuilder.

      • columnsBuilder

        public ColumnsBuilder columnsBuilder()
        Description copied from interface: QueryFactory

        Creates a builder for the columns in SELECT expressions.

        Calling this method is equivalent to calling QueryFactory.columnsBuilder(SetQuantifier) and passing SetQuantifier.ALL as argument.

        Specified by:
        columnsBuilder in interface QueryFactory
        Returns:
        The new ColumnsBuilder.

      • callFunction

        public QueryExpression callFunction(SQLFunctionLiteral function)
        Description copied from interface: QueryFactory
        Returns a query for calling a SQL function without a schema. The query is SELECT * FROM functionName(params...). Calling this method is equivalent to calling QueryFactory.callFunction(String, SQLFunctionLiteral) and passing null as first argument.
        Specified by:
        callFunction in interface QueryFactory
        Parameters:
        function - The function to call.
        Returns:
        A query returning the results of calling SQL function.
